title: Princess Margaret in Mauritius and East Africa
brief_description: A record of Her Royal Highness Princess Margaret’s visit to Mauritius, Zanzibar, Tanganyika and Kenya in 1956. Scenes showing the principal ceremonial occasions, the tours of inspection carried out by the Princess, and the enthusiastic welcome accorded her throughout the tour, are included.
